meanings.sent1: My preceptor at school helps me learn new things every day.
meanings.sent2: The preceptor in the classroom explained the math problem clearly.
meanings.sent3: The preceptor made learning fun by using games to teach us.
meanings.sent4: She was like a preceptor guiding me through the maze of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The preceptor's patience and wisdom inspired all the students.

meanings.sent1: My preceptor in the hiking club showed me the best trails to explore.
meanings.sent2: The experienced preceptor advised the new employees on their career paths.
meanings.sent3: The preceptor always knows the right path to take, like a wise owl.
meanings.sent4: She became my preceptor, leading me through the challenges of life.
meanings.sent5: The preceptor's guidance was like a beacon in the dark, showing the way forward.

meanings.definition: One who gives practical training or instruction.
meanings.sent1: The preceptor at the workshop demonstrated how to use the tools safely.
meanings.sent2: As a preceptor, he taught the interns the best practices in the industry.
meanings.sent3: The preceptor's hands-on approach made learning exciting and engaging.
meanings.sent4: She was a preceptor sculpting young minds with knowledge and skill.
meanings.sent5: The preceptor's training was so effective that everyone quickly mastered the task.
